name: KODAV3PrimaryMarketplace
description: KnownOrigin Primary Marketplace for all V3 tokens. The contract is pausable and has reentrancy guards. The following listing types are supported: Buy now, Stepped, Reserve and Offers.

functionDecorators.name: accessControls
functionDecorators.description: Address of the access control contract.

functionDecorators.name: editionOrTokenListings
functionDecorators.description: Edition or Token ID to Listing.

functionDecorators.name: editionOrTokenWithReserveAuctions
functionDecorators.description: 1 of 1 edition ID to reserve auction definition.

functionDecorators.name: koCommissionOverrideForCreators
functionDecorators.description: primary sale creator -> KO commission override set by admin.

functionDecorators.name: koCommissionOverrideForEditions
functionDecorators.description: Edition ID -> KO commission override set by admin.

functionDecorators.name: paused
functionDecorators.description: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

functionDecorators.name: reserveAuctionBidExtensionWindow
functionDecorators.description: A reserve auction will be extended by this amount of time if a bid is received near the end.

functionDecorators.name: reserveAuctionLengthOnceReserveMet
functionDecorators.description: Length that bidding window remains open once the reserve price for an auction has been met.
